channel.title: Active Directory on Note about technology
channel.description: Recent content in Active Directory on Note about technology

item.title: Active Directory Reconnaissance: In-Depth Analysis of Attacker Techniques
item.description: Attackers leverage standard tools and legitimate privileges to conduct reconnaissance in Active Directory (AD). If undetected, this phase enables lateral movement and privilege escalation. This article dissects advanced commands used in real-world attacks and provides defensive countermeasures.
